trans-unit.source: Hive JSON Example (Data Factory)
trans-unit.target: Hive JSON Example (Data Factory)

trans-unit.source: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: This topic and its sub-topics provides the JSON format that is supported by the older versions of Azure PowerShell.

trans-unit.source: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="03f459ba-403e-4096-9cb5-eb381804ca92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hive Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.
trans-unit.target: If you are using the July 2015 Release version of Azure PowerShell or later, see <link xlink:href="03f459ba-403e-4096-9cb5-eb381804ca92" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">HDInsight Hive Activity</link> for the latest JSON format.

trans-unit.source: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>
trans-unit.target: You can convert the JSON from old format to new format by using the tool: <externalLink><linkText>JSON Upgrade Tool</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=618507</linkUri></externalLink>

trans-unit.source: This topic provides information about using the Hive Transformation with the HDInsight Activity.
trans-unit.target: This topic provides information about using the Hive Transformation with the HDInsight Activity.

trans-unit.source: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel> transformation with the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.
trans-unit.target: The following JSON snippet shows the syntax for using the <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel> transformation with the <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel> in a pipeline JSON file.

trans-unit.source: Note the following:
trans-unit.target: Note the following:

trans-unit.source: Activity <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Activity <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>HDInsightActivity</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>linkedServiceName</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>MyHDInsightLinkedService</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>linkedServiceName</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>MyHDInsightLinkedService</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: The <embeddedLabel>type</embeddedLabel> of the <embeddedLabel>transformation</embeddedLabel> is set to <embeddedLabel>Hive</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: You can specify the Hive script inline for the <embeddedLabel>script</embeddedLabel> property or store script files in an Azure blob storage and refer to the file using <embeddedLabel>scriptPath</embeddedLabel> property, which is explained later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: You can specify the Hive script inline for the <embeddedLabel>script</embeddedLabel> property or store script files in an Azure blob storage and refer to the file using <embeddedLabel>scriptPath</embeddedLabel> property, which is explained later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: You specify parameters for the Hive script by using the <embeddedLabel>extendedProperties</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: You specify parameters for the Hive script by using the <embeddedLabel>extendedProperties</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: More details are provided later in this topic.
trans-unit.target: More details are provided later in this topic.

trans-unit.source: Example: Using Hive Queries that are stored in Azure Blob storage
trans-unit.target: Example: Using Hive Queries that are stored in Azure Blob storage

trans-unit.source: When using a Hive activity, you can reference Hive scripts that are stored in Azure blob storage.
trans-unit.target: When using a Hive activity, you can reference Hive scripts that are stored in Azure blob storage.

trans-unit.source: The Azure storage account needs to be associated with the HDInsight cluster, in order for the Hive activity to be able to read the files during execution.
trans-unit.target: The Azure storage account needs to be associated with the HDInsight cluster, in order for the Hive activity to be able to read the files during execution.

trans-unit.source: The following properties need to be defined when referring to the script file.
trans-unit.target: The following properties need to be defined when referring to the script file.

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>scriptPath</embeddedLabel> – Path to the Hive script file
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>scriptPath</embeddedLabel> – Path to the Hive script file

trans-unit.source: <embeddedLabel>scriptLinkedService</embeddedLabel> – Azure storage account that contains the script file
trans-unit.target: <embeddedLabel>scriptLinkedService</embeddedLabel> – Azure storage account that contains the script file

trans-unit.source: Parameterized Hive query
trans-unit.target: Parameterized Hive query

trans-unit.source: See the following example for specifying parameters for a Hive script using extendedProperties.
trans-unit.target: See the following example for specifying parameters for a Hive script using extendedProperties.

trans-unit.source: To use parameterized Pig scripts, do the following:
trans-unit.target: To use parameterized Pig scripts, do the following:

trans-unit.source: Define the parameters in extendedProperties.
trans-unit.target: Define the parameters in extendedProperties.

trans-unit.source: In the Hive Script, refer to the parameter using ${hiveconf:parameterName}.
trans-unit.target: In the Hive Script, refer to the parameter using ${hiveconf:parameterName}.

trans-unit.source: Use Pig and Hive with Azure Data Factory
trans-unit.target: Use Pig and Hive with Azure Data Factory
